name: garden (zz2742)
description:
For thousands of years you have been eaten by the giant and resurrected the next day to eating again 
In the garden there are fire plants Turn off the fire and Running away from the garden

The game is complete But there may be problems even though it has been checked .please let me know the problems you encountered and the changes you want my to do
